## LLM\_OPS\_CONFIG.OPEN\_PATH property

OPEN\_PATH 对象定义了与Helicone API进行通信时的基础设置。

**Signature:**

```typescript
static OPEN_PATH: {
        baseURL: string;
        defaultHeaders: {
            "Helicone-Auth": string;
        };
    };
```
